snippet: The Studio Company of American Ballet Theater’s Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis School performed at Pace University’s Michael Schimmel Center on Friday evening.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews dance performance by the American Ballet Theater Studio Company at the Schimmel Center for the Arts.
lead_paragraph: The Studio Company of American Ballet Theater’s Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis School performed at Pace University’s Michael Schimmel Center on Friday evening.

headline.seo: ABT’s Studio Company at Pace’s Schimmel Center
headline.main: Young Dancers, Poised in the Classic and the Contemporary
headline.print_headline: Young Dancers, Poised in the Classic and the Contemporary
